root: ^My parents are in their bedroom, with the doors closed. I can hear some moaning coming from out there. What do I do?
^Try knocking on the door and shouting
^Take advantage of their absence and watch an adult TV channel

res1: ^I'm banned to watch cartoons for a week
^My parents locked themselves in their bedroom doing some strange stuff. I knocked on the door and got banned from watching cartoons for a week.
res2: ^For being good, they bought me that toy I really wanted to have
^My parents locked themselves in their bedroom doing some strange stuff. I didn't interfere and was given a toy for this.
res3: ^My parents gave me a really hard time I just don't know why
^I didn't interfere and got a new toy for this. I took advantage of my parents' absence to watch an adult TV channel. They punished me then.
res4: ^I couldn't see anything. Whatever, next time I will figure it out
^I was peeping through the keyhole but couldn't see anything.
